title: Wasn't Spectre (James Bond) the last 007 movie for Daniel Craig? Has he changed his mind? I think he is in James Bond: No Time to Die (2020). - Quora

response.answer_text: Evidently he has changed his mind. Of course, both Sean Connery and Roger Moore had made claims of making a last Bond movie and then made more. Three each, I believe. As to why Craig changed his mind, I’m not sure. I suspect a good script and a large paycheck may have influenced him. The large paycheck, of course, being much more of an influence.
